original_text: Go and look at Calneh city. And go and look at Hamath city. Then go and look at Gath city, where the Philistines live. Are your cities stronger than their cities? Do you have more land than they do?
korean_text: 너희는 갈레로 건너가 보고 거기에서 큰 하맛으로 가고 또 블레셋 사람의 가드로 내려가라 너희가 이 나라들보다 나으냐 그 영토가 너희 영토보다 넓으냐

sentences.original_text: Go and look at Calneh city.
And go and look at Hamath city.
Then go and look at Gath city,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음에 가서 가드 성을 보라.

sentences.original_text: Are your cities stronger than their cities?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 도시들이 저들의 도시들보다 더 강한가?

sentences.original_text: Do you have more land than they do?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 저들보다 더 많은 땅을 가졌는가?
